# sqldf - tutorial

`sqldf` package lets you treat any data.frame object as a sql table.  You can write queries just line in a database. Pretty useless, comparing to, say, data.table, dplyr or tidyverse.


```{r}
library(sqldf)

sqldf('select * from mtcars where mpg > 21')

sqldf('select mpg, cyl, disp from mtcars where cyl = 6')
```
